Dialog.Title: Ip Dip Instruction and Confirmation
Dialog.Content1:
Left-Click:
Click on the canvas at appropriate locations to place numbered markers.
Dialog.Content2:
Mouse wheel:
Hover over a marker and scroll the mousewheel to increase/decrease the % chance a given marker will be randomly chosen.
Dialog.Content3:
When finished placing markers:
Click on the Ip Dip button in this dialog to randomly select a marker.
